articles.description: Mohamed Salah's wait goes on in his bid to beat the Premier League's goal involvement and assist records - but he has one more chance this season.
articles.title: Brighton 3-2 Liverpool: Mohamed Salah waits for Premier League record

articles.description: Manchester United play "the most financially important match in the club's history" against Tottenham on Wednesday - BBC sports editor Dan Roan explains why it is one they cannot afford to lose.
articles.title: Europa League final: The £100m match Manchester United can't afford to lose

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Jack Grealish may have to leave the club this summer with "the writing on the wall" for him, says their former goalkeeper Shay Given.
articles.title: Jack Grealish: 'Writing on the wall' for Manchester City midfielder says Shay Given

articles.description: England's men's Test side are ranked second in the world but want to reach the next level, says head coach Brendon McCullum.
articles.title: England Test side will 'shoot for the stars' in marquee year - head coach Brendon McCullum

articles.description: Emma Raducanu produces an encouraging display to reach the second round in Strasbourg as she continues to build momentum before the French Open.
articles.title: Strasbourg Open: Emma Raducanu builds French Open momentum with win over Daria Kasatkina

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brighton & Hove Albion vs Liverpool in the Premier League
articles.title: Brighton vs Liverpool LIVE: Premier League score, stats & latest updates

articles.description: BBC Sport golf correspondent Iain Carter analyses the controversy of Rory McIlroy's "non-conforming" driver at the 107th US PGA.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy and the 'non-conforming' driver controversy

articles.description: Arthur Ashe Stadium - the US Open's showcase court - is set to be expanded as part of an $800m renovation project at Flushing Meadows, the United States Tennis Association has announced.
articles.title: US Open: Arthur Ashe Stadium to get revamp as part of $800m renovation plan

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne is the "second-best" passer he has worked with - after Argentine great Lionel Messi.
articles.title: Kevin de Bruyne: Manchester City midfielder 'second-best' passer after Messi

articles.description: Eighth place in the Premier League could be enough for European qualification, as long as Chelsea lose to Nottingham Forest and then beat Real Betis.
articles.title: How Brighton, Brentford or Bournemouth could play in Europe
